page.title: 13MANSFIELD COLLEGE OF ARTS
page.content: {THE COLLEGE ON CHESTERFIELD ROAD} HAS MANY ACTIVITIES HAPPENING THERE. FOR EXAMPLE THERE ARE THE NIGHT CLASSES FOR ADULTS WHO WANT TO TAKE A PARTICULAR SUBJECT TO A FURTHER DEGREE.THERE ARE ALSO THE SATURDAY MORNING CLASSES FOR CHILDREN WHO ARE INTERESTED IN CRAFT POTTERY,EMBROIDERY ETC. THE CLASSES HAVE A SUBSCRIPITION OF TWO POUNDS FOR EVERY TEN WEEKS.THE SCHOOL ALSO ORGANISES TRIPS OUT TO GALLERIES AND STUDIOS WHICH ARE ALL FREE.THE SATURDAY MORNING CLASS STARTS AT 9am.AND FINISHES AT 11.30am.. THE COLLEGE ALSO HAS A SHOP WHERE CRAFT EQUIPMENT IS SOLD AT A CHEAPER PRICE THAN IN THE SHOPS. I GO TO THE COLLEGE ON SATURDAY MORNINGS AND ENJOY IT VERY MUCH AND I AM GLAD THAT MANSFIELD HAS THIS FACILITY.
